headline: Roth Capital Lowers its Price Target on Live Nation Entertainment, Inc. (LYV) to $174 and Maintains a Buy Rating
summary: Live Nation Entertainment, Inc. (NYSE:LYV) is among the 11 Best Entertainment Stocks to Buy According to Wall Street. On February 12, 2026, Roth Capital lowered its price target on Live Nation Entertainment, Inc. (NYSE:LYV) to $174 from $176 and maintained a Buy rating. headline: Live Nation (LYV) Q4 Earnings Report Preview: What To Look For
summary: Live events and entertainment company Live Nation (NYSE:LYV) will be reporting results this Thursday afternoon. Here’s what investors should know.
